metadata.title: CVE-2020-12410 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers reported memory safety bugs present in Firefox 76 andFirefox ESR 68.8. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird <68.9.0, Firefox < 77, and Firefox ESR < 68.9.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
